title: Effect of an increase in transfer payments

content.question: With an upward-sloping aggregate supply curve, an increase in government transfer payments will most likely

choices.label: reduce the level of nominal gross domestic product
increase real gross domestic product in the short run
shift the short-run aggregate supply curve to the right
shift both the aggregate demand curve and the long-run aggregate supply curve to the left

content.answer: increase real gross domestic product in the short run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
